metadata.title: GfaPy: A flexible and extensible software library for handling sequence graphs in Python
metadata.abstract: Summary GFA 1 and GFA 2 are recently defined formats for representing sequence graphs, such as assembly, variation or splicing graphs. The formats are adopted by several software tools. Here, we present GfaPy, a software package for creating, parsing and editing GFA graphs using the programming language Python. GfaPy supports GFA 1 and GFA 2, using the same interface and allows for interconversion between both formats. The software package provides a simple interface for custom record types, which is an important new feature of GFA 2 (compared to GFA 1). This enables new applications of the format.

description: Flexible and extensible software library for handling sequence graphs in Python.
name: GfaPy
